name: supereminence
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being more important or better than others: The city's supereminence as a market is related to its supereminence in size. The changing political scene has put him in a position of super-eminence. Synonym
pre-eminence
More examplesFewer examples He used the machinery of illusion to achieve supereminence.One of them wanted supereminence of power, the other wanted supereminence of knowledge.They had a strong belief in their unlimited super-eminence.He had not at that time attained the position of super-eminence that came later.
